title: Elon Musk's Plan to Buy Twitter Raises Many Questions
itunes:title: Elon Musk's Plan to Buy Twitter Raises Many Questions
description:
Bloomberg Opinion Senior Columnist Tim O’Brien explains why Elon Musk is the wrong leader for Twitter’s vital role. Bloomberg News Congressional Tax Reporter Laura Davison discusses how Musk’s untaxed wealth is riling Democrats. Bloomberg News Editor Tom Maloney talks about how Musk is going to cover the $21 billion equity portion of the transaction that he’s personally guaranteed. Bloomberg News Senior Editor for U.S. Health Care Drew Armstrong explains that faulty and incomplete data has hindered the fight against Covid. And we Drive to the Close with Alan Lancz, Research Director at LanczGlobal.com.Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.  

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
